title: Medela pestilentiae wherein is contained several theological queries concerning the plague, with approved antidotes, signes and symptoms : also an exact method for curing that epidemicial distemper, humbly presented to the Right Honourable and Right Worshipful the lord mayor and sheriffs of the city of London.
author: Kephale, Richard.
publisher: Printed by J.C. for Samuel Speed,
notes: Caption title: Medela pestilentiae, or, Rules for the prevention and cure of the plague.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
